title: Angelina Jolie lands in Spain as she films for Marvel's Eternals
text:
She's playing superhero Thena in the new Marvel movie Eternals, due for release in November 2020.

And Angelina Jolie was enjoying a break from all the filming action on Monday to stock up on groceries in Fuerteventura alongside her daughter Vivienne, 11.

The Hollywood star, 44, caused a stir when she arrived at a local supermarket in a white silk slip with a deep V back, showing off her extensive tattoo collection.

Supermarket sweep: Angelina Jolie was enjoying a break from filming The Eternals on Monday to stock up on groceries in Fuerteventura alongside her daughter Vivienne, 11

Angelina was hard to miss her negligee inspired dress, which she paired with simple flat sandals and oversized shades.

The mother and daughter duo stocked up on supplies for a busy week ahead, enjoying some precious quality time together.

The A-list actress was spotted arriving at the airport earlier in the day, gliding through the terminal in style, flanked by an army of security guards.

Angelina was elegant as ever for her travels, sporting a black dress and a pair of oversized shades.

Negligee chic: The Hollywood star, 44, caused a stir when she arrived at a local supermarket in a white silk slip with a deep V back, showing off her extensive tattoo collection

Off duty glamour: Angelina was hard to miss her negligee inspired dress, which she paired with simple flat sandals and oversized shades

Production was underway in the Dunes of Corralejo, with tents and trailers set up in the stunning Natural Park desert, which boasts 48,000 hectres of land.

The actress is set to join Salma Hayek, Richard Madden, Kumail Nanjiani, Scarlett Johansson and Don Lee in the big budget movie.

At the panel dedicated to Marvel during San Diego Comic Con, Angelina said: 'I’m so excited to be here! I think what it means to be a part of the MCU, what it means to be an Eternal, what it means to be in this family.

Busy schedule: The A-list actress was spotted arriving at the airport earlier in the day, gliding through the terminal in style, flanked by an army of security guards

On set: Production was underway in the Dunes of Corralejo, with tents and trailers set up in the stunning Natural Park desert, which boasts 48,000 hectres of land

'We’ve all read the script and we know what the task is and so we are going to work very, very hard,' she added, according to JustJared.

Fellow cast-member Scarlett is set to reprise her role as Natasha Romanoff, aka Black Widow, for a spin-off prequel film after her character met her untimely end in Avengers: Endgame.

She previously gushed that it's 'very exciting' to have Angelina in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).

Her outing comes as the Maleficent sequel has overtaken Joker for the weekend box-office crown in North America.

A-list project: The actress is set to join Salma Hayek, Richard Madden, Kumail Nanjiani, Scarlett Johansson and Don Lee in the big budget movie

Final figures released Monday showed Maleficent: Mistress of Evil earned $19.4 million, pulling ahead of Joker by a mere $122,000.

Joaquin Phoenix-fronted Joker had been the top film on Sunday based on studio estimates after being knocked out of the top spot by Maleficent last week.

It has earned $278 million in the United States and Canada in its first four weeks, and it is the international record-holder for an R-rated film with $852 million in earnings.

The Maleficent sequel, which stars Angelina Jolie as the classic Disney villain, has earned $66.2 million in North America in its first two weeks.
description: Angelina Jolie was enjoying a break from all the filming action to stock up on groceries in Fuerteventura alongside her daughter Vivienne, 11, on Monday.
